title: S'more to Love STL-611 Six-S'more Maker
features: Perfect s'mores anywhere in just 5 minutes
Easily stacks 6 s'mores and securely locks them into place for cooking
Perfect for indoor treats - use in your over or toaster oven
Great on the barbecue - no need for a campfire
Easy clean-up with soap and a non-abrasive sponge
description: The S'More To Love S'More maker offers you a fast, easy way to make that delicious marshmallow, chocolate and graham cracker treat right in your oven, toaster oven or on your grill. No more dirty campfires and burnt marshmallows - this innovative treat-maker allows you to make 6 tasty S'mores in just minutes. Sweet creamy marshmallow, crunchy toasted Graham Crackers and soft melted chocolate. Mmmm. Simply stack, lock and place on your grill or in your oven and be the hit of any barbecue, picnic or party.

title: Roast Marshmallows Dining Room Table with this S'mores Maker
Electric Flameless S'mores Maker with Lid
